{{flavour|A very rare and extremely effective weapon, featuring a pole with half-moon blades at both ends.}}

{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Staves]]' category. It is a two handed weapon.}}

'''Lajatangs''' are the most powerful staves, as far as melee combat is concerned. For their damage output, lajatangs have a remarkably low base delay, meaning they require less skill to use effectively.

As chopping weapons, lajatangs will cut off [[hydra]] heads. As Staves, lajatangs may generate with the [[speed brand]].

==Strategy==
At [[minimum delay]], lajatangs are worse than comparable options like [[great mace]]s or [[great sword]]s. However, lajatangs require much less skill than competitors - 14 rather than 20 skill. And if you were already using a [[quarterstaff]], you might as well use a lajatang (if you find one).

True to its description, lajatangs are rare. [[Agnes]] always carries a lajatang. You can occasionally find lajatangs on [[spriggan defender]]s.
